attributes.action: Give England back to the English (see details for points relating to National Service, freedom of speech, army and immigration)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1.Compulsory National service for 1yr on finishing education (before going on to university or College). For all girls who chose to opt out, 1yr of domestic science to teach them how to cook and keep house. Goal is to teach the yob culture the values of yesteryear, prevent obesity & deter teenage pregnancies).
2.Give us back our freedom of speech which has been taken away due to the Countries desire to be politically correct in every sense even the absurd.
3.Use of Army should be for defending OUR country NOT getting involved in other countries civil unrest.  This is an obvious waste of lives and of our governments money.
4.Immigration–send them ALL home.  Regardless of whether they are from Africa,India,the EU or even the Southern America,anyone legitimately seeking residency in this country should be able to speak comprehensible and audible English and fit in with society (rather than be a drain on it) & NOT be covered by shroud’s or head dresses in the name of religion.
